node.title: What does it take for a COVID-19 strain to become a 'variant of concern'?
node.alt: An Australian Clinical Laboratories worker places a nasal swab into a vial for COVID-19 testing.
node.description: There are actually thousands of coronavirus strains out there, but there are a few boxes that need to be ticked before they're escalated to the level Omicron's at.Â
node.content:
["The World Health Organization (WHO) escalated the Omicron strain to 'variant of concern' status on Friday.\u00a0", "Since then, it's been called concerning, mild\u00a0and manageable.", "So, how bad is it?", "
How does a strain become a 'variant of concern'?
", "That's decided by the WHO's\u00a0Technical Advisory Group on SARS-CoV-2 Virus Evolution (TAG-VE), an independent group of experts tasked with monitoring and assessing mutations of the virus.\u00a0", "First off, a variant must meet both 'variant of interest' criteria, which means it has to:", "
From 'interest' to 'concern'
", "Once it's ticked off those boxes, it can\u00a0be escalated to a 'variant of concern' status if it meets any of the following criteria:", "There's currently five variants of concern, being Alpha, Beta, Gamma, Delta and, of course, Omicron.", "And there are\u00a0two variants of interest, which are\u00a0Lambda and Mu.", "There's also seven 'variants under monitoring', which are strains that\u00a0may pose a future risk, although the evidence of that risk is unclear.", "Those variants haven't been given\u00a0Greek alphabet names yet\u00a0because it may turn out they don't pose a significant risk.\u00a0", "
But it can be downgraded\u00a0
", "A variant can be reclassified if it ticks any of the following boxes:", "And that's actually pretty common.\u00a0", "Australia's Chief Medical Officer Paul Kelly told Channel Seven there'd been tens of thousands of\u00a0SARS-CoV-2 variants over the last two years.", "\"Even the 13 that have been labelled as varients of concern have been quite concerning at the beginning and then as more information has come through, less concerning,\" he said.\u00a0", "
'Particularly concerning' mutations
", "On Saturday, the federal Department of Health put out a statement announcing new international border rules\u00a0banning people from nine southern African countries from entering Australia\u00a0unless they were Australian citizens, permanent residents or immediate family members.\u00a0\u00a0", "\"The Omicron variant has a high number of mutations within its spike protein, which is particularly concerning,\" the statement said.", "But it also said the travel restrictions were only \"precautionary\".\u00a0", "
Worth 'pausing' our reopening for
", "Yesterday, Prime Minister Scott Morrison said he'd made a\u00a0\"temporary decision to pause\" plans to reopen Australia's international borders.\u00a0", "That went a step further than the weekend's travel rules.\u00a0", "It meant\u00a0plans to allow visa holders \u2014 such as students and skilled workers \u2014 and South Korean and Japanese tourists, were pushed back a fortnight from tomorrow\u00a0to December 14.\u00a0", "Mr Morrison's statement emphasised the temporary nature of the pause, which he said would give Australia time to assess the severity of the virus.\u00a0", "", "
The federal government says the travel restrictions are only temporary.\u00a0(ABC News: Luke Stephenson)
", "
'Mixed reports' about its severity
", "This morning,\u00a0Professor Kelly said early reports suggested the virus had mild symptoms\u00a0but it was important to remember experts were only drawing on information from a small pool of patients.", "\"There's mixed reports on that from\u00a0South Africa,\" he said.\u00a0", "Professor Kelly said the people who tested positive for the strain in Australia had \"very mild\u00a0or in fact no disease\", but there were only a handful of cases.\u00a0", "And they're young people who have been fully vaccinated, so it's unclear how it would impact older or unvaccinated people.\u00a0", "
But the government says it's 'manageable'
", "Federal Health Minister Greg Hunt said there was \"an overwhelming\u00a0view\" that while there was still much we don't know about the strain, it was a\u00a0\"manageable variant\".", "That was in the context of extending border restrictions until December 15, so it sounds like the government is of the view that a few weeks of border restrictions will be enough to manage the strain.\u00a0", "And Professor Kelly says he's still \"committed to continue to reopen\" the country.\u00a0", "\"We cannot keep this Omicron variant out forever from Australia \u2014 eventually\u00a0it will be here,\" he said", "\"Most importantly\u00a0now we do what we can to slow down\u00a0that introduction and all of the\u00a0measures that have been introduced\u00a0will assist with that.\"", "", "
Heavily mutated Omicron variant puts scientist on alert
"]
